resources.string:
My name is Jones Mbindyo. 

I'm problem solving oriented enthusiast to ensure changes and disruptions in the technology industry can have significant influence on the future. 
I can conduct research, plan, design, write, test, provide advice and improve information technology systems, software and related concepts for specific applications. 

I can also develop associated documentation and design, develop, control, maintain and support databases and other information systems to ensure optimal performance and data integrity and security. 

My main objective is structure on issues surrounding development and implementation of IT solutions that meets information technology needs in modern business.
